name: H4T3 Vir Battle
description:
Hey guys this is a little game i've made for Private Event with my friends, game theme was "Misanthropy",

It's multiplayer game, you have to shoot other tanks.

Controls: 

movement: WSAD

shoot: mouse

under Esc you can change music settings and exit game.

First one to join into the server will be admin so he could set things up and start match.

Have fun guys.

Hope everything works. It crashes somethimes i'll try to fix it.
